item.title: How to Write Useless Comments
item.description: I’ve noticed a peculiar trend among some reviewers: they seem to have a knack for crafting comments that could pass as a generic template for any manuscript. It’s as if they’ve mastered the art of writing feedback so vague it could be applied to any paper, leaving authors to decipher the cryptic messages and make revisions that might as well be written in the stars.
